projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform with real-time inventory management, payment processing, and admin dashboard.
projects.longDescription: Built a comprehensive e-commerce solution featuring product catalog, shopping cart, secure payment integration with Stripe, real-time inventory tracking, and a powerful admin dashboard for order management and analytics.

projects.title: Task Management System
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.
projects.longDescription: Developed a Trello-like task management system with boards, lists, and cards. Features include real-time collaboration, drag-and-drop interface, file attachments, comments, and activity tracking.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A responsive weather dashboard with location-based forecasts, interactive maps, and historical weather data visualization.
projects.longDescription: Created a modern weather application featuring current conditions, 7-day forecasts, interactive weather maps, and historical data visualization using Chart.js. Includes location search and geolocation support.

projects.title: Blog Platform
projects.description: A modern blogging platform with markdown support, SEO optimization, and content management system.
projects.longDescription: Built a feature-rich blogging platform with markdown editor, syntax highlighting, SEO optimization, and a comprehensive CMS for content management. Includes user authentication and role-based access control.

projects.title: Portfolio Generator
projects.description: A dynamic portfolio generator that creates beautiful, responsive portfolio websites from JSON configuration.
projects.longDescription: Developed a tool that generates customizable portfolio websites from JSON configuration files. Features multiple themes, responsive design, and easy deployment options.

projects.title: API Monitoring Dashboard
projects.description: A real-time API monitoring solution with health checks, performance metrics, and alerting capabilities.
projects.longDescription: Created a comprehensive API monitoring dashboard that tracks uptime, response times, and error rates. Includes customizable alerts, historical data analysis, and integration with popular notification services.
